BTC
=
PRU
Your personal deposit address in QR:
Your personal deposit address:
   
1C29gpF5MkEPrECiGtkVXwWdAmNiQ4PBMH
Please do not send transactions directly from an exchange!

To take part in the token offering, you should simply send ETH (BTC, DASH or LTC) to the token offering address.
Your tokens will be sent to your sending address automatically.
If you have already sent Bitcoins to the address above, please wait 1-2 min to receive them by it's blockchain.
▶ You can use this address multiple times.
▶ Deposit will be creadited after 1 network confirmation.
▶ Minimum deposit is 0.009 BTC.
▶ To check transaction status your can use http://etherscan.io website.
▶ Your wallet must support ERC-20 to recieve PRU tokens. (We recommend MyEtherWallet or MetaMask).
